caption: Better than ever! This restaurant is truly the best when it comes to its pizza and pasta. The taste of it is truly heavenly, and I must say that they have the best service in the area.
Prepare to leave this restaurant stuffed! Best pizza i had in a long time!
this is the place to go if you're looking for great food.
Pretty good pizza. They have buy a large get one free.
I had a fantastic time here because the staff is very friendly and the food is delicious. They also provided the best and fastest service of any restaurant in the world!

This place continues to blow my mind. I rotate local pizza spots, but That Pizza Place never lets me down. Delivery is fast, accurate + arrives HOT. It’s super consistent, and you can get any combination of toppings under the sun. BOGO …
Omg I was so hungry and this happens and I now sometimes in pastas is normal because I love pastas but this was to much and that’s not still including the rest that I thumped out 🥺🥺🥺

What a wonderful restaurant! The pizza and pasta were delicious. Besides, the crust, sauces, and methods of cooking were impressive and satisfying. The spot was also tidy, suitable for a date, and trendy. Others must arrive!

I was so astonished at this shop! I love their atmosphere and their interior decorations. They had fun high chairs and wonderful handwritings on the chalkboard, where their menu was hand-written. Yesterday, we had Parmesan Chicken, and it …

Don’t waste your time. The man behind the counter is unstable and confrontational. I purchased pizza online & paid. He tried to charge me again and didn’t want to hear me out after I said there was a misunderstanding because I already paid. …

Sandwiches are fantastic. Order Steak sandwich, even if not on the specials board.  Great lite salmon lunch too.  Update--this place changed name to E Che.  Same owner, same excellent food.  Remodeled interior (better).

Similar to Digiorno pizza from store. Seemed undercooked when I ate my first slice. I took it back and then it was overly crispy where my daughter couldn’t chew the crust. Save your $$ not worth it at all!! 38$ for a “buy one get one free” deal that makes no sense. We couldn’t even enjoy our cheat meal
The staff was super sweet. Worth every dollar. Nice workers who were effective and had several tips, can't wait to come back. It's amazing to have pizza crust.
On a Saturday night, we stopped here and it wasn't overly crowded, so we sat right away. We all had pizza and it was fantastic. A medium fed about 3 of us, giving each of us two big slices.
Lots of variations. They also offer take out pizza that can order and then come and pick up.  They serve great pizza and very good appetizers. Nice service. Very highly recommended.

If you want to experience Los Angeles this is the place to go. And not too expensive either! Honestly a MUST DO for anyone travelling LA! They were the best pizza slices we've had in the 4 months we've been here.
We’re sad we didn’t find this gem sooner. Loved the pizza. They are very generous on toppings. A great place to have a meal.
Pizza was some of the best pizza I've had the chance to eat. If you want a variety of delicious thin crust and deep dish pizzas in San Fran, come here!
5 stars

Amazing food, wonderful atmosphere, top-notch chefs well this restaurant is to die for.   I think in this town they served the most delicious Italian food.   The food came out so quickly. The waiters were very accommodating and friendly. …

We liked to spend our time here because while watching the movie, we are accommodated with a comfy seat. We felt relaxed and we could focus on watching the movie. The place was fully airconditioned and the area was super clean. We liked …
Very delicious pizza!  I had ordered the special with thin crust cut in squares cook extra crispy turned out perfect! Plus I order the anti-pasta salad and the Italian dressing was delicious!
This is actually the best pizza in the city. Decent Prices, and comfortable friendly environment. Get the home made ice tea, or a beer.
The music, the service, the salad and the gluten free pizza all came together for an awesome dinner.

delicious! im not usually a deep dish pizza fan, but after my friend told me it's a must try- i couldn't say no. we ordered and a friend thankfully picked it up for us. i got my deep dish pie with mushroom and pepperoni's. lots of sauce- …
This pizza place is one of the best in the city!  The place was a little dark but the people who work there are friendly and down to earth.
Ordered take away - 10/10!!! My go to place in the hood. Pizza arriving boiling hot (yum!!) and super generous on toppings, thin crust in the center with thick, chewy borders. A dream.

As we walked around, we were surprised at the number of Italian options! Our son got a craving for some pasta and came back to this place after passing it earlier in the day. We made orders and all of the flavors are excellent. We all loved the taste of it! Super yummy! I would recommend this place to everyone.

Raymond is a great man that you can have deep and important conversation with and he understand you plus he shows you his adorable new born he's is genuinely a great man...PLUS the pizza and sandwiches are the BEST in la crescenta hands down. If you haven't tried it you're missing out

Pretty great little pizza place! Came here tonight and ordered a Caesar Salad, a mini cheese pizza and a small pizza with extra cheese, sausage, onions and jalapeños. Everything comes out super hot and fresh which I loved. My only …

Tried for the first time today! Ordered for our office lunch and we were very impressed! Food was hot and tasty. Pizza is delicious and salads are very fresh. Delivery was prompt! Will be ordering again!
Always so delicious.
Delicious and incredibly quickly delivered. Also pasta is just as good as their pizza!

I've always seen this place while driving, but I never thought much of it. My friend and I were craving pasta and this was in our area, so we decided to stop by here on a Friday night around 7 something, close to 8 PM. Wasn't too busy where we had to wait long, but the inside was full. We only had to wait about 5 minutes or so.

Best tasting Italian food in town! Made my Mother's Day! Excellent customer service and great food! I love their potato gnocchi pesto and eggplant parmigiana! So much good items on the menu! The price and servings sizes are very good. Will definitely be back for seconds, thirds and more!

My husband and I had dinner here during our visit a year ago. I ordered the chicken pesto pasta which had neither chicken nor pesto. It was really good. The pizza was fantastic, the best I've ever had. They also have a very accommodating staff who would welcome the customers nicely. I would be recommending this place to everyone.

Chicken Mushroom Gnocchi Was my first time trying this meal, and I was really surprised, it was so good! My husband got the Alfredo pasta and was so yummy too! Really nice environment, good food and good service. I love this restaurant! I also love to recommend this place to everyone who are pasta lovers.

A highly recommended pizza pub in the area! I really love their pizza. It was so delicious and the crust was so crunchy.  The cheese on top was perfectly melted. The place has a great ambiance. The pizzas were very affordable. The staff was so pleasant and accommodating. Overall it was a great pizza pub!

I highly recommend this pizza hub cause they serve the best pizza in town! With a thin crust and the crispness of it! The cheese that indulge your mouth and you can tell the crew to add more of its toppings with not that pricey additional fee. What a perfect pizza pub in the area. I can't wait to visit this place again!
Meat  and more meat is the best
Ordered first time tonight tonight. Not impressed. Chicken Marsala didnt have any taste. Cauliflower was very greasy. Wont order from there again.

It was a week ago when my mom brought me to this place. I was so really fascinated by this place. It was so clean and has a great ambiance. The dishes that they serve was so delicious and affordable. The bolognese was so tasty it was really made from authentic Italian sauce. This restaurant is my new favorite place!
Staff is nice, but the pizza just isn't great.
The place serves large dishes and for fair prices. helpful staff. Keep up the good work.

The only place that comes even close to authentic trattoria food in Italy. I just returned from a 10 day trip in Naples, Amalfi coast and Rome. The pesto is right on. The Bolognese is delicious. A lot of people are used to Americanized Italian food. A true gem in LA!
Decent food here. Soft drinks are ice cold. Pizza super hot. Cheesy. What else can I say :-)
We liked That Pizza Place better. Simple but Nice atmosphere here too. We arrived close to closing but the staff was incredibly nice and offered to make a pizza to go.
This is a small place. My wife likes their wings. I like the steak wedgie or sub. You order at the counter and they bring it to your table.

Customer service is horrendous. Very rude, curt and unprofessional responses from whoever manages their phones... The pizza is really greasy too and their toppings are limited. You are better off ordering Fresh Brothers or Domino's where they actually respect their customers and want to deliver yummy pizza with a smile.
5 stars for being hot and ready. Excellent pizza. I've ordered many times from here and they use top quality ingredients.
I wasn't ready for how amazing the pizza would taste. OMG best pizza!  Great atmosphere!
Not the best pizza, crust is thick and doughy, sauce is whatever. I got a veggie pizza and the veggies were barely cooked on top. Maybe the pizza wasn't cooked enough.
The vegetables are always fresh and that is a good thing. The place is always clean. Best place for me.
I had a slice of the Grandma and a cheese pie, and let me tell you it was the best pizza I've ever had.
Terrible pizza.
Swell place with solid friendly service, great lighting, and a diverse spread of beers on tap. And then there are plenty of unique selection of menus to choose from.!
Pizza was very fresh and flavorful. Only downsides were that the building is under the name of Cicerros, and the establishment was a little dirty with the lack of a displayed menu.
Amazing Amazing Amazing!!!⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ They have the BEST Caprese salad with big slices of Beefsteak tomatoes🍅, fresh mozzarella 🧀
Pizza was good. Siracha Chicken Sandwich was Awesome, prices were great but location and decor definitely need work!
One large pizza is good for 2 persons. The pizza was so good and flavorful
I really like their Italian pizza
mazing pepperoni pizza! Delicious!!! The slices are huge!!! Love it <3
Wow! Large  and tasty Pizza. I'm a Pizza lover and i'll be here again and again.
One large pizza is good for 2 persons. The pizza was so good and flavorful.
We love That Pizza Place. Great wings & pizza!
They were unfriendly and 15  minutes late  with my door dash order.
I got a mixed pizza and it was pretty average. I was disappointed with the flavor. They need a chicken tikka masala pizza, but don't have one.
Buttery finish and great flavors!  A wonderful stop in downtown Houston from a chaotic day!  Thanks guys for making some pretty damn straight up pizza!
Good food decent price❤

I come here quite often, either for dine in or takeout. I guess I'm boring, but I always get the same thing, the rosemary chicken sandwich. Sure, sometimes their fries are different, but the sandwich is always consistently good! No matter …
Incredibly incorrect name - place has SO much more than just good pizza  Try the steak sandwich (rad) and the salmon is to die for!

Amazing Amazing Amazing!!!⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ They have the BEST Caprese salad with big slices of Beefsteak tomatoes🍅, fresh mozzarella 🧀, either sliced or in little balls, fresh mixed arugala salad greens with fresh basil and wonderful homemade …
Very good food
Pretty good place!
#1 The best food and service ...👌👌👌💐💐💐
Bad

Amazing pepperoni pizza! Delicious!!! The slices are huge!!!  It was worth the 20 minute wait because someone ordered 70 (seventy) pizzas just before mine...yes it was a Friday night. LOL  Definitely a repeat customer and highly recommend.

Pizza was great. Finally a decent pizza in LA. Dude's attitude might put some people off, but he's just direct and to the point. If you're really upset by him, you'll never like getting anything in New York lol. He just ain't got no time for that lol. He was very nice and courteous to me as I was to him. Good stuff!

Found this place by random over 5yrs ago. Now it's a must stop if I'm nearby for lunch. They have a HUGE lunch special menu with an amazing selection of GOURMET meals - my favorite is the Rosemary Chicken sandwich which comes on an …

I got a small pizza, which was alright. The veggies seemed old and watery, and yet it took 40 mins to get a small pizza. If you're in a hurry go somewhere else. The good thing was that the staff was nice.
This place has great pizza! The guys that work here are really nice as well. I  would definitely recommend this place :)
Great pizza
Like all is well, but I did not like. However 5 stars. Thanks.

Love this place!!! Food is delicious! You can't go wrong ordering anything off the menu. Prices are very descent and food comes in big portions.  I've had the pasta, pizza and salads but my favorite is the turkey burger. Friendly service, fresh ingredients.
If you like very fresh food that is the place for you, great  Service  and good food
Good prices and great pizza.

This is one of my favorite places to eat in LA. The food is so good that it keeps me coming back every week. Even though it's a bit of a drive for me.  My favorite things are the chicken tequila and the steak sandwich. They are also priced really well.  Definitely my go to place for cheap healthy food
Cheap,Fast,Delicious, Fresh!!! What else u need for quick homemade meal???  I always order from them!! Love the Pizza Place! Greetings from smoke shop)
One of my favorite spots in LA. The ultimate hidden gem. Ask for the salmon sandwich or rosemary chicken.
The pizza is pretty good but overpriced mang! I prefer some other pizzas in the city, but if you're in the area and hungry (or you're with someone who really wants to try it), it's not a bad option.

There food is cheep and delicious. I order from them at least 3 times a week. They are extremely stingy and if you ask for extra anything they charge you for it. Also they need a knew delivery guy. Doesn't even say a word and glares even …
This place flys under the radar but the menu is huge and the quantity of food you get for the price is huge. Not the speediest place.
Food is good, service is not so good.
Delicious food at a great price. I'm definitely a returning customer
Delicious food that is restaurant quality. Fast service and friendly staff. Only downside is the limited seating.
Reasonably good pizza, good price (2 for the price of one). I also tried their "Chicken Tequila" which sounded good and probably would have been with about a 1/2 cup less oil! Much, much too greasy.

The food is great but customer service was unacceptable the man on the phone Juan was sooo rude even when went in person to speak with him he tried to argue with me. Food great but customer service a shame! I must say senice this incident a few months ago the customer service has gotten a lot better. And the food is  still outstanding.

For simple inexpensive food, that arrives warm and doesn't take forever this is a great place. No delivery charge and good food. We had the california burger and the classic cheese pizza. We will definitely be ordering from them again.

Great value!  For $13 we had a cobb salad and a large pizza.  My wife and I were stuffed, and still had leftovers.  Plus, my wife was pleased with the quality.  She's a harsh critic when it comes to pizza.  Dominoes and Papa John's will no longer do.  However, she liked the pizza, and loved the salad.  We'll order from here again.
